name: Dont do it or DIE
description:
Hi guys!

I had fun making this weird little game.
Still have 1 jam day left so maybe i add something extra.
Im not the type that goes rating everyones game just to receive ratings.
But i do appreciate you guys showing your appreciation.
You can find me on twitch for regular gamedev streams where i usually work with unreal engine.
https://www.twitch.tv/wormjuicedev

Anyways this is my submission for the GMTK 2021 gamejam
Have fun!
